snippet.title: AUTS gameplay (PC Game, 1995)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for AUTS (aka auts - the ultimate stress relief game), Dos PC game produced by KUDOS in 1995 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/auts/6823/
AUTS is a side scrolling game on split screen, where players control V-shaped space ships and try to destroy each other with bullets and a secondary equipped gun that can be chosen from an arsenal of two dozen imaginative weapons.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Roketz - https://youtu.be/Kxwso4Lmeb8
Pyrotechnica - https://youtu.be/HNrB8ol7Sq0
Virtua Cop - https://youtu.be/hSF3vD6l6rA
